name: Ginyu
effect: [登场时] 我方的战斗场上存在3张以上拥有特征《弗利萨军团》的BATTLE卡的场合，将我方的2张能量转为活跃状态。之后，本回合中，我方无法登场<基纽>。

[Blocker] (After an opponent's attack, you may switch this card to Rest Mode and change the target of the attack to this card.)
[When KO'd] Choose up to 1 of your opponent's Battle Cards and switch it to Rest Mode.

name: Cooler
effect: [阻挡者] (对方攻击后，可以将此卡牌转为休息状态，并将攻击对象改为此卡牌)

[When Attacking]/[When Blocking] Choose up to 1 of your opponent's Battle Cards and switch it to Rest Mode. Then, if that card has a cost of 2 or less, KO it.

name: Cooler
effect: [阻挡者] (对方攻击后，可以将此卡牌转为休息状态，并将攻击对象改为此卡牌)

[When Attacking]/[When Blocking] Choose up to 1 of your opponent's Battle Cards and switch it to Rest Mode. Then, if that card has a cost of 2 or less, KO it.

name: Guldo
effect: [起动主要] 将这张卡转为休息状态：选择对方的1张休息状态的BATTLE卡，在下个对方的回合中，无法转为活跃状态。
[Activate Main] Switch this card to Rest Mode : Choose up to 1 of your opponent's Rest Mode Battle Cards and it can't switch to Active Mode during your opponent's next turn.

name: Zarbon
effect: [登场时] 确认我方卡组最上方的5张卡牌，公开其中最多1张卡名含有<弗利萨>的卡牌并加入手牌，将剩余的卡牌随机顺序放回卡组最下方。

[On Play] Look at 5 cards from the top of your deck, then reveal up to 1 card that includes <Frieza> in its card name and add it to your hand. Place the rest at the bottom of your deck in a random order.

name: Salza
effect: [暴击] (这张卡的攻击造成伤害时，将那张生命卡弃置)

name: Salza

[Permanent][Your Turn] If you have a total of 3 or more cards with 《Ginyu Force》 in their special traits among your Leader and Battle Cards, this card gets +5000 power.
